name: The Mask Game
description:
The Mask Game is a short game about friendship, crushes, communication issues, and demons.

The ladies from this game will be returning in the upcoming death game https://store.steampowered.com/app/2129680/RIP_Tour/.

FEATURES
  • Fully voice-acted
  • 8 endings
  • Original OST
  • Illustration gallery
  • ~2 hour playtime
